detectors.description:
DemaxBallot.delegate(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DemaxBallotFactory.sol#96-120) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- proposals[delegate_.vote] += sender.weight (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DemaxBallotFactory.sol#112)
	- total += sender.weight (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DemaxBallotFactory.sol#113)
	- delegate_.weight += sender.weight (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DemaxBallotFactory.sol#117)
	- total += sender.weight (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DemaxBallotFactory.sol#118)

vote(uint256) should be declared external:
